Label: CT 101: Long position in a Negative Amortizer at Notional
Description: Long position in a Negative Amortizer at Notional of USD 1000.0, with annual amortizing payments amounting to USD 200.0 and interest payments at floating rates calculated as forward rates based on today's reference Yield Curve + a Spread of 2%.
